name: Lost in the woods (John)
description:
You are an hero in a new world! You must find he way to your home. Butm you ARE NOT ALONE, you will face enemies and some scary noises in your short trip. Will you win the evil?

Move: W,A,S,D

Jump: SPACE BAR

Attack: F

IF YOU ARE PLAYING IN BROWSER DONT CLICK "QUIT" and "QUIT AS A WINNER"

SPRITES: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/bandits-pixel-art-104130

SCARY NOISES: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-noir-mystery-stingers-...

MAIN MUSIC: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/free-universal-soundscapes-1...

This game isn't completed, it's a small version of what I wanted to do. I just didn't have time to make the completed version, so they may be some bugs. The only bug I know, is the animation bug when the animations don't play correctly, you will see that too.

Anyway, I hope you like my game that is made in 3 days!
